t: Elevate Brands banks $250M to roll up third-party merchants selling on Amazon's marketplace | TechCrunch
s: July 13, 2021 - The Amazon roll-up play — where one company creates economies of scale by buying up and consolidating multiple smaller third-party merchants that sell their goods via Amazon’s marketplace — continues to be a strong e-commerce trend, and in the latest development, one of the hopefuls in this space is announcing a major injection of capital to fuel its own place in the field.
